messages.message:
Hi Team,
Enabled a new setting on Github to enable auto-merging. Now you donâ€™t have to wait around for tests for pass before merging :slightly_smiling_face:

After PR is ready and reviewed, you can enable auto-merge. The PR will get auto-merged in if all the tests pass. Docs (https://docs.github.com/en/pull-requests/collaborating-with-pull-requests/incorporating-changes-from-a-pull-request/automatically-merging-a-pull-request)
PR I tested this on: https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/73776
